author: Anonymous Atom
title: Racket HelpDesk
question:
I noticed that we won't be allowed to use the helpdesk for this midterm. I was wondering if we are expected to be familiar with the order to feed arguments to built-in racket functions that we've seen before in lectures. For instance with the "place-image" should we prepare to remember that the order to feed the arguments is: 
(place-image image x y scene)
or would information like this generally be provided on midterms?
